semesters.prerequisite: Computer Architecture I. Operating System I. Computer Architecture II(optional).
semesters.evaluation: 60% - Project (10% - Proposal Report, 10% - Progress Report, 40% - Final Portfolio, 5% - Code README, 15% - Project Final Report, 10% - Code Demonstration, 10% - Final Presentation), 15% - Assignments, 20% - Reading Presentation, 5% - Participation
